text.tspan: Time spent in domestic work, female vs. male, 2015
The average hours per day that women and men aged 20-74 spent on housework, child and adult care, gardening
and pet care, construction and repairs, shopping and services, and household management.
Time spent in domestic work, male (hours)
Time spent in domestic work, female (hours)
Source: World Bank Gender Statistics: Time spent in domestic work, female (hours), World Bank Gender Statistics: Time spent in domestic
